name: Renzokuken
entries: Beginning at 14th level, as an action on your turn, you may expend all bullets remaining in your Barrel Firearm, and make an attack against a creature within range for each bullet expended in this way (you cannot select the same creature twice). Each of these attacks is treated as being a Burst Strike attack. Each attack made in succession while using this feature increases your Firearm’s Misfire score by 1 until the end of your turn.
Once you’ve used this feature, you cannot use it again until you finish a Long Rest.
